REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2155 reute r f BC-<TEXSCAN-CORP>-IN-AGR 03-30 0053

TEXT.TITLE: <TEXSCAN CORP> IN AGREEMENT WITH LENDERS
TEXT.BODY: Texscan Corp said it has reached agreement in principle with bank lenders United Bancorp of Arizona <UBAZ> and Security Pacific Corp <SPC> on a plan of reorganization from Chapter 11 bankruptcy. It said a plan is expected to be filed within 10 days. Reuter
